item.title: Kubeconf 2018: The Overview
item.description: I attended KubeConf 2018 in Seattle a week ago. I’ve decided to distill the core concepts that I think are important from the conference into this blog post. I can categorize what the conference was trying to push into 5 concepts: Observability is King Do 1 Thing Well Choose Tools Appropriately Everyone Needs to know Cloud Ops Be Cloud Provider Agnostic These aren’t new ideas but they were so prominent and spoken about in so many ways that they seemed novel and obvious.
